generated_text:
- road: The cobblestone surface in the foreground and extending into the distance is a road, as it is a designated path for vehicles.
- sidewalk: The raised, paved area on the right side of the image, bordered by a fence and covered in leaves, is a sidewalk, as it is designated for pedestrians and separated from the road.
- building: The white and brown buildings with windows and roofs in the background are clearly buildings.
- wall: The low, brick wall on the right side of the image, adjacent to the sidewalk and fence, is an individual standing wall.
- fence: The metal fence running along the right side of the image, next to the wall, is a fence.
- pole: The vertical poles holding traffic signs and lights on the left side of the image are poles.
- traffic light: The traffic light boxes mounted on poles on the left side of the image are traffic lights.
- traffic sign: The blue circular sign with a white arrow and the triangular warning sign mounted on poles on the right side are traffic signs.
- vegetation: The tall, leafy trees on the right side of the image and the smaller bushes on the left are vegetation.
- terrain: The grassy and leaf-covered ground along the sidewalk on the right side is terrain.
- sky: The open, overcast sky visible above the buildings and trees is the sky.
- person: A person can be seen standing near the traffic light on the left side of the image.
- car: The red car and the silver car parked on the left side of the road are cars.
- bus: The white, articulated vehicle with windows and a destination sign on the road is a bus.
- train: The bus is not on rails, so it is not a train.
- motorcycle: There is no motorcycle visible in the image.
- bicycle: A bicycle can be seen parked on the left side of the image, near the traffic light.
- truck: There is no truck visible in the image.
